choices.name: Get started with research for your Ohio ancestors.

hidden.summary:
• Learn successful research strategies for Ohio ancestors.
  • Record Finder: Use the Record Selection Table to determine priorities for Ohio research.

text:
1. Introduction: Learn about basic Ohio research strategies.

    ☆ FS—Basic Ohio Research Tips and Strategies
    AR—Finding Ohio Ancestors

  2. Get an overview of Ohio research in these videos.

    ☆ FS—Ohio Overview—6:04
    ☆ AAC—Researching Your Ohio Ancestors—54:53 (account required)

  3. Follow this research study for Ohio ancestors, from 1880 to the present.

    ☆ FS—Step-by-Step Ohio Research, 1880-Present

  4. Ancestry: Explore resources for Ohio research on Ancestry.

    ☆ AC—Ohio Resources
    ☆ AC—Ohio State Research Guide, 5 pgs.

  5. Record Finder: Use the Ohio Record Finder to decide on records to search.

    ☆ FS—Ohio Record Selection Table

    6. Additional Records
    1. Explore a variety of records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
    2. Explore historical photo sites on ☆Ancestor Hunt.
    3. Explore resources for school yearbooks on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.

    Case Studies
    1. Follow these case studies for Ohio research.

      ☆ LDS—Discovering the Family of a Woman Living in Ohio
      ☆ LDS—Finding a woman's family who had moved from Ohio to Australia

    2. Here is a case study about finding parents for an adopted child.

      ☆ LDS—Finding the parents of an adopted child born in the 1870s in Ohio

    Ethnic
    1. African American: Learn about African Americans in Ohio in these FamilySearch Wiki articles.

      ☆ FS—Wiki: African American Resources for Ohio
      ☆ FS—Wiki: Ohio Minorities

    2. Learn more about African American records.

      ☆ AG—Ohio African American Records
      ☆ African American Genealogy Resources

    3. Explore the African American Gateway for Ohio.
    4. Native American: Learn about American Indians in Ohio in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

      ☆ FS—Wiki: Indians of Ohio

    ☆ History

  3. Learn about Ohio history on InfoPlease.com.

    ☆ Ohio History
